content: I don't have a particular preference
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content:
I see, I see,
So <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
what do you like to eat nowadays?
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content:
So you're someone who likes to test their pain tolerance!
But Manna's no slouch either,
I once ate three whole bottles of chili sauce without drinking any water!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content:
I get it, I get it, these are the fundamental flavors of cooking.
Everyone who learns to cook must master the secrets of saltiness and umami...
Just like how martial artists must first learn the horse stance!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content: I've found a flavor I really like lately.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content:
Being a good eater helps you grow bigger...
And more <size=64>healthy</size>!
When it comes to food, Manna is just like you!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content:
When I like something, I'll keep eating it until I get sick of it!
That's just how Manna is!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content:
Good children eat everything on their plate!
Mommy used to praise me like that. Can I praise
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color> the same way?
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content:
Manna loves sweets too!
Wait a sec—I think I <size=64>like ALL flavors!</size>
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-食物-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content:
Oh, it's <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>!
"Have you eaten yet?"— Wait a minute—
I remember you don't have any preferences when it comes to <color=#8AAB4B>food</color>?
